item.description:
Hello Ladies we are finally going to schedule this meetup to see Precious. Thursday night was the most popular night chosen by the group, so if you can't make it, please check out our next meetup social event. Please see details below for the movie.

Where are we viewing it: Kaufman Astoria Cinema

Time: 7:15 pm

Meeting Place: Purchase your tickets and come meet me inside the movie! I will be saving seats middle row for all who sign up!


After the the movie we can go for a quick bite or get a night cap and chat about the film!

Please try to show up by 7:15pm as I will be saving a row of seats for us before the lights go out in the theater! Look for the women in orange scarf and hat and green coat at the middle row!!

See you there Madams!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be sitting in the middle row with an orange scarf and hat on!
item.name: Precious Movie Night
